mutants.code:
def generate_longest_permutation_chain(n):

    def swap(arr, i, j):
        (arr[i], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[i])
        return arr
    arr = list(range(1, n + 1))
    chain = [arr.copy()]
    swap(arr, 0, n - 1)
    chain.append(arr.copy())
    for i in range(n - 1, 1, -1):
        swap(arr, i, i - 1)
        chain.append(arr.copy())
    return [len(chain)] - chain

def generate_longest_permutation_chain(n):

    def swap(arr, i, j):
        (arr[i], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[i])
        return arr
    arr = list(range(1, n + 1))
    chain = [arr.copy()]
    swap(arr, 0, n - 1)
    chain.append(arr.copy())
    for i in range(n - 1, 1, -1):
        swap(arr, i, i - 1)
        chain.append(arr.copy())
    return [len(chain)] * chain
